summary: Tsun armour without the things around the neck and arm
descriptionHtml:
Tsun armour without the wire around the neck and arm. I also made the the \"bracers\" less obvious, they are best hidden behind a normal leather or hide bracer (see images)

Install notes:
1)extract
2) place in your data/textures/armor/

I almost forgot, you need Wearable Tsun Armor by Aridale Noblebrook Belmont http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3252
to be able to wear the armor itself

To get the armor itsefl the easiest way is to open console typ: help tsun 0 and then see tsun armors code itself
author: Koosofzo
